rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
年轻血液能否成为扭转与年龄相关的认知能力下降的关键？奥克兰大学的研究人员发现，年轻血液中的血小板因子 4 (PF4) 是逆转小鼠与年龄相关的认知能力下降的关键因素。这项研究为治疗痴呆症相关疾病和增强老年人脑功能提供了一条有前途的途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Could-young-blood-be-the-key-to-reversing-age-lated-cognitive-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Could-young-blood-be-the-key-to-reversing-age-lated-cognitive-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a067ad24-ccec-425d-a1b6-cf54d911aa37 Wed, 11 Oct 2023 23:53:00 -0400 Could young blood be the key to reversing age-related cognitive decline?
基因编辑鸡在具有里程碑意义的研究中表现出对禽流感的抵抗力研究人员利用 CRISPR 技术培育出抗禽流感的鸡，针对特定基因抑制病毒复制。这项研究揭示了使用基因编辑作为疾病控制策略的前景和复杂性，也揭示了流感的适应性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Genetically-edited-chickens-show-resistance-to-avian-influenza-in-landmark-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Genetically-edited-chickens-show-resistance-to-avian-influenza-in-landmark-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f869fc1-a22b-4bad-9623-7ef3219da6e5 Wed, 11 Oct 2023 23:32:00 -0400 Genetically edited chickens show resistance to avian influenza in landmark study
临床试验测试一水肌酸和运动以保持前列腺癌患者的肌肉质量美国国家癌症研究所向亨斯曼癌症研究所的研究人员提供了总计超过 300 万美元的资助，用于开展一项临床试验，看看将一水肌酸补充剂和阻力运动训练相结合是否有助于保留转移性前列腺癌患者的肌肉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Clinical-trial-tests-creatine-monoHydrate-and-exercise-to-preserve-muscle-mass-in-prostate-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Clinical-trial-tests-creatine-mono一线水合物-and-exercise-to-preserve-muscle-mass-in-prostate-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=afe6101a-b829-43cb-8514-5c8a01fb1852 Wed, 11 Oct 2023 23:26:58 -0400 Clinical trial tests creatine monohydrate and exercise to preserve muscle mass in prostate cancer patients
新AI软件实现黑色素瘤100%检出率新研究显示，使用人工智能 (AI) 软件进行皮肤癌检测已迅速改进，最新软件对黑色素瘤的检出率达到 100%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/New-AI-software-achieves-10025-detection-rate-for-melanoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/New-AI-software-achieves-10025-detection-rate-for-melanoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7e06277-3f78-4d4d-a756-6472fe50f855 Wed, 11 Oct 2023 23:22:34 -0400 New AI software achieves 100% detection rate for melanoma
新药物分子恢复失去的神经肌肉连接，增强力量斯坦福大学医学院的研究人员发现，一种小分子先前被证明可以通过恢复神经和肌肉纤维之间失去的连接来增强受伤或年老的实验室小鼠的力量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/New-drug-molecule-restores-lost-nerve-muscle-connections-enhances-strength.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/New-drug-molecule-restores-lost-nerve-muscle-connections-enhances-strength.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e624063f-1e5d-40f2-bfa1-1e14b38e382a Wed, 11 Oct 2023 23:19:41 -0400 New drug molecule restores lost nerve-muscle connections, enhances strength
与安慰剂相比，盐水注射治疗钙化性肌腱病没有提供有意义的益处《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项试验得出结论，广泛用于治疗钙化性肌腱病（一种由肩部肩袖肌腱中钙积聚引起的常见疼痛病症）的盐水注射疗法与安慰剂相比并没有任何有意义的益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Saline-injection-treatment-for-calcific-tendinopathy-provides-no-meaningful-benefit-over-placebo.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Saline-injection-treatment-for-calcific-tendinopathy-provides-no-meaningful-benefit-over-placebo.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e800826-44ac-4327-97ef-42b656e54baa Wed, 11 Oct 2023 23:15:47 -0400 Saline injection treatment for calcific tendinopathy provides no meaningful benefit over placebo
中年和老年的“双重危险”是否会阻碍美国人的预期寿命？研究表明，自 2010 年以来美国预期寿命停滞不前，65 岁以上人群死亡率上升对美国预期寿命的影响比工作年龄成年人的死亡率上升更为显着。这一发现被称为“双重危险”，凸显了迫切需要采取有针对性的干预措施来改善各年龄段的健康结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Is-double-jeopardy-of-midlife-and-old-age-stalling-Americas-life-expectancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Is-double-jeopardy-of-midlife-and-old-age-stalling-Americas-life-expectancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2fff720-7547-4ae0-9f0f-b5dfda7d9ebd Wed, 11 Oct 2023 23:15:00 -0400 Is "double jeopardy" of midlife and old age stalling America's life expectancy?
众议院小组将就错误的社会保障支付举行听证会众议院一个小组定于下周举行听证会，讨论社会保障管理局如何追回错误支付给受益人的款项。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/House-panel-to-hold-hearing-on-erroneous-social-security- payments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/House-panel-to-hold-hearing-on-erroneous-social-security- payments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e17​​0fb08-2e84-4a21-829c-7d2fae858c3b Wed, 11 Oct 2023 23:07:39 -0400 House panel to hold hearing on erroneous social security payments
人工智能帮助神经外科医生现场识别脑肿瘤类型该患者患有什么类型的脑肿瘤？ AI 技术有助于在手术期间（1.5 小时内）尽早确定这一点。这个过程通常需要一周的时间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/AI-helps-neurosurgeons-identify-brain-tumor-types-on-the-spot.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/AI-helps-neurosurgeons-identify-brain-tumor-types-on-the-spot.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=14348db1-1da9-49e3-8932-9438605db89c Wed, 11 Oct 2023 23:05:52 -0400 AI helps neurosurgeons identify brain tumor types on the spot
粘蛋白糖基化在预防肥胖和肠道炎症方面发挥着至关重要的作用粘蛋白位于胃肠道的粘液层中，即带有糖分子的蛋白质，在对抗细菌感染并通过未知机制为友好的肠道细菌提供安全港方面发挥着关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Mucin-glycosylation-plays-crucial-role-in-protecting-against-obesity-and-intestinal-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231011/Mucin-glycosylation-plays-crucial-role-in-protecting-against-obesity-and-intestinal-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3395626-f401-4cf4-99bb-f3a46f5657e5 Wed, 11 Oct 2023 22:59:05 -0400 Mucin glycosylation plays crucial role in protecting against obesity and intestinal inflammation
